content: Hi Charlie, I hope you're doing well. I was talking recently with Bob, and he mentioned something about a fun game he had made up. He said it was a word puzzle, where he had chosen an eight-letter word, and was challenging his friends to guess it. I love puzzles and I thought it would be fun to try. Can you ask Bob about it?
Hey Bob, Alice told me about the word puzzle game you came up with. It sounds intriguing! Can you tell me more about it?
